fullText: Larry David's first Broadway play is a fitfully funny family comedy that feels more like an extended 'Seinfeld' episode than a fully realized theatrical work.
dtliExcerpt: Larry David's first Broadway play is a fitfully funny family comedy that feels more like an extended 'Seinfeld' episode than a fully realized theatrical work.
